input.sentences: on the streets | we ran into this neat diner .
the owner told us a bit about the establishment .
outside the shop was a bulletin wall with papers .
the doors and furniture were very interesting .
the shop had long windows and was in the city .
output.sentences: Today I ran around in this neat street.
I told the owner of this establishment that their food is good.
He has his menu displayed outside which is cool.
They are having some remodeling and this is what the future door will look like.
Overall I like the windows and I love that this shop is in the city.
